name: globalwindatlas_powerdensity
title: Wind Power Density Potential
details: The mean wind power density is a measure of the wind resource. Higher mean wind power densities indicate better wind resource.

extract_types_info.mean: average power density per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum power density per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum power density per unit of analysis

options.variable_description: power density in Watts per meter squared

extras.citation: Wind data obtained from the â€œGlobal Wind Atlas 2.0, a free, web-based application developed, owned and operated by the Technical University of Denmark (DTU) in partnership with the World Bank Group, utilizing data provided by Vortex, with funding provided by the Energy Sector Management Assistance Program (ESMAP). https://globalsolaratlas.info. Accessed online 2019-03-05.
